name: greasiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality or state of being full of grease (= any thick oil-like substance): There were three pancakes, and each was fried to perfection, with not a hint of greasiness. Hair becomes instantly shiny and easier to style, without greasiness . See
greasy
More examplesFewer examplesThe fritters were fried to quite a deep colour, but without any greasiness.The cream absorbed into the skin quickly and without any form of greasiness.Wipe the blades of greasy knives with a peeled lemon and the greasiness will disappear.
